use_cases_desc: Large displays placed in the conference venue showing videos from upcoming sessions. By manually connecting to a display from the conference app content on a large display could be added to a personal schedule. During ongoing sessions the large displays could also be used to view play lists created on personal devices.
contribution_desc: The paper presents a system deployed at CHI 2013 to provide at-a-glance overview of upcoming sessions on large displays. Attendees could interact with the displays through the mobile app for the conference either by creating a custom video playlist to show on the display or adding on-screen content to their personal schedule.
